src:
Karim Benzema: 50 Gol di Liga Champions dan Samai Rekor Lionel Messi
07 Nov 2019, 11:54 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Laga Real Madrid vs Galatasaray menjadi panggung sempurna bagi pemain muda, Rodrygo. Namun, ada satu nama lain dari Real Madrid yang juga tampil bersinar yakni Karim Benzema.
Laga Real Madrid vs Galatasaray pada pekan ke-4 Grup A Liga Champions 2019/2020 digelar di Bernabeu pada Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Real Madrid tampil sempurna dengan meraih kemenangan 6-0.
Real Madrid unggul cepat pada menit ke-4. Dengan kaki kirinya, Rodrygo menyelesaikan umpan dari Marcelo. Tiga menit berselang, Rodrygo kembali menyelesaikan umpan Marcelo menjadi gol. Kali ini dengan sundulan kepala.
Real Madrid makin perkasa setelah unggul cepat. Pada akhirnya, Madrid menang dengan skor 6-0. Empat gol tambahan dicetak Sergio Ramos [penalti], Karim Benzema [2 gol] dan gol ketika Rodrygo.
text:
Karim Benzema: 50 goals in the Champions League and equals Lionel Messi's record
Nov 7 2019, 11:54 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Galatasaray vs Real Madrid became the perfect stage for young players, Rodrygo. However, there is one other name from Real Madrid that also appears to glow, Karim Benzema.
Real Madrid vs Galatasaray match in the fourth week of Group A Champions League 2019/2020 was held at the Bernabeu on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs. Real Madrid performed perfectly by winning 6-0.
Real Madrid took the lead in the 4th minute. With his left foot, Rodrygo completed the pass from Marcelo. Three minutes later, Rodrygo returned to finish Marcelo's pass into a goal. This time with a header.
Real Madrid is getting more powerful after winning fast. In the end, Madrid won 6-0. Four additional goals were scored by Sergio Ramos [penalty], Karim Benzema [2 goals] and goals from Rodrygo.
